original_text: I belong to Israel's people, to Benjamin's tribe. I am a true Jew. They circumcised me when I was eight days old. I was a Pharisee, and I obeyed the Jewish rules very carefully.
korean_text: 나는 팔일 만에 할례를 받고 이스라엘 족속이요 베냐민 지파요 히브리인 중의 히브리인이요 율법으로는 바리새인이요

sentences.original_text: when I was eight days old
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 태어난 지 팔 일 만에

sentences.original_text: and I obeyed the Jewish rules very carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 유대인 규율을 매우 신중하게 지켰습니다
